text: Futhi ningadli kulokho ekungashiwongo igama likaMvelinqangi kukona (ngesikhathi kubulawa) futhi ngempela kona kuwukungahloniphi futhi ngempela osathane bagqugquzela abangane babo ukuthi baphikisane nani futhi uma nibahlonipha (nibalalela) ngempela nina niyokuba ngabenzela uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni (ngabakhonza izithixo)
